1.「よく 来てくれたね。ここは 札強化屋だ。| 今日は どんなご用かな？|<sel: I'm glad you're here. This is a strong|bill... What can I do for you today?|<select_se_off>|add an effect|Growing Effectiveness|Erase the effect attached|I'll get a wonder card|Listen to the explanation|<select_end><break>

5.「効果を付けたいカードは どれだい？|<break>: Which card would you like to add the effect|to?<break>

6.「この中から 付けたい効果を| 選んでくれるかな。|<break>: You can choose any of these effects you|want...<break>

7.「<%sL_ADD_KOUKA>だね。| 金のフェザーチップ <%nL_WATA: <%sL_ADD_KOUKA... I'll add a gold feather tip|<%nL_WATASU_TIP> to the effect, okay?<yesno_2><break>

9.「このカードは ロックされているね。| 本当に 効果を付けても いいかい？|<y: This card is locked... Are you sure you don't|want me to put an effect on it?<yesno_2><break>

10.「他に 用はあるかい？|<select_se_off>|効果を付ける|効果を成長: Is there anything else I can do for you?|<select_se_off>|add an effect|Growing Effectiveness|Erase the effect attached|I'll get a wonder card|Listen to the explanation|<select_end><break>

11.「効果を消したいカードは どれだい？|<break>: Which card would you like to remove the|effect from?<break>

12.「消したい効果を 選んでくれるかな。|<break>: You pick the effect you want to get rid of...<break>

13.「<%sL_ERASE_KOUKA>だね。| 効果を消した後 <%sL_MODO:
<%sL_ERASE_KOUKA... <%sL_MODORU_ITEM> back to|<%nL_MODORU_TIP> after removing the effect...|It costs <%nL_CARD_GOLD> gold, but can I|
|remove the effect of <%sL_ERASE_KOUKA>?

15.「このカードには これ以上| 効果を付けられないな……。| すまないが 別のカー: I can't add any more effects to this card.|I'm sorry, but you'll have to choose another|card.<bw_break>

16.「効果を消すには| <%nL_CARD_GOLD>ゴールド 必要なんだが| どう: I need <%nL_CARD_GOLD> gold to remove the|effect, but apparently I don't have enough...<bw_break>

17.「このカードは ロックされているね。| 別のカードを選んでくれるかな。|<bw_: This card is locked. Please select another|card...<bw_break>

18.「……すまないが ひとつのカードに 同じ効果を| ふたつ以上 付けることはできな: I'm sorry. I'm sorry, but you can't have more|than one of the same effect on a single card.|You'll have to choose a different effect.<bw_break>

19.「金のフェザーチップが 足りないようだね。|<bw_break>: You're missing a gold feather tip...<bw_break>

20.「そのカードには まだ| 効果が ひとつも付いてないな。| すまないが 別のカー: That card still doesn't have any of the|effects. I'm sorry, but you're gonna have to|choose another card.<bw_break>

21.「効果を成長させたいカードは どれだい？|<break>: Which of these cards would you like to grow|in effect?<break>

22.「成長させたい効果を 選んでくれるかな。|<break>: You can pick and choose the effects you want|to see grow...<break>

23.「<%sL_GROW_KOUKA2>にするなら| 金のフェザーチップを <%nL: I'll take a <%nL_WATASU_TIP> gold feather tip|if you make it <%sL_GROW_KOUKA2>, but can I|grow the effect?<yesno_2><break>

25.「このカードは ロックされているね。| 本当に 効果を成長させても いいかい？|: This card is locked... Are you sure you don't|want me to grow an effect on you?<yesno_2><break>

29.「僕の店では 不思議のカードという 札アクセに| キミの望む通りの 合成効果を付:
In my shop, we have these magical cards that|can be used to create any effect you desire.|I give away the cards for free, but to add|
|effects or enhancements, you'll need a few|gold feather chips... Once an effect is|applied, it can be reversed. And all the gold|
|feather chips used for the effect are|returned to you. However, you will need to|pay a fee of <%nL_CARD_GOLD> gold to remove|
|the effect, so please understand that...|Also, please do not accidentally discard the|card with the effect... You'll lose the|
|feather chip you used...

30.「僕でよかったら いつでもチカラになろう。| 用がある時は 遠慮なく 声をかけて: If it's okay with you, I'm always here for|you. If you need anything, please don't|hesitate to call me.<end>

31.「不思議のカードを 持ってないようだね。|<end>: I don't have the wonder card...<end>

32.「よく 来てくれたね。ここは 札強化屋だ。| しかし 塔がこの状態では| 商売も:
I'm glad you're here. This place is a|powerhouse... But with the tower in such a|state, it's hard to do business. It would be|
|a great help to me if some of you fancy a|little help with Mr. Chakolotto.

33.「不思議のカードを もらっていくかい？|<yesno><break>: Do you want to take the wonder card?<yesno><break>

38.「やめておくんだね。| ほしくなったら いつでも言ってくれ。|<bw_break: I'll stop... If you ever need anything, just|let me know...<bw_break>

39.「では 不思議のカードを お渡ししよう。| 効果を付けたカードは 間違って| 捨: Now, I'm going to give you a wonder card...|Just make sure you don't accidentally throw|away the card with the effect...<bw_break>

40.「……すまないが その効果は| これ以上 成長させられないんだ。| 別の効果を: I'm... I'm sorry, but I can't let that effect|grow any further. You'll have to choose|another effect.<bw_break>

41.「キミが 魔物退治に協力してくれたおかげで| ようやく 商売を再開できそうだよ。:
Now that you've helped us defeat the demon,|we can finally get back to business. I'd like|to say thank you... Yes... I'm Ra, the card-|
|enhancer. At my shop, we sell cards of|wonders that can be used to create any effect|you desire. I give out the cards for free,|
|but to add effects or enhancements, I require|a few gold feather chips as payment. Once an|effect is applied, it can be reversed. And|
|all the gold feather chips used for the|effect are returned to you. However, you will|need to pay a fee of <%nL_CARD_GOLD> gold to|
|remove the effect, so please understand|that... Also, do not accidentally discard the|card with the effect... You'll lose the chip|
|you used. Now...
